sub_title: Scientist and Research Theme Coordinator at Maastricht University
summary:
My ambition is to work in an inspiring environment and with an enthusiastic team. To keep up with the latest developments and maintaining and developing external contacts. To supervise and manage projects. I enjoy working in an interdisciplinary environment. I am conceptually strong, reliable, aware of my surroundings and have an eye for detail.

I’m always looking for concrete results in the form of actual application in my work. I can apply an engineering approach when needed. I love working with data. Biomedical signals for one, but also data in general. trying to reveal what is in there. A good sense for what is happening in my surrounding is important to me. Not only socially, but also to ensure that matters in the department go smoothly. I actively cooperate with the industry and have an interest in actual product development.

 2016:
